body_html: Actually, I don't think that's going to work because we're going to have to manually specify the match string anyway, unless we can figure out how to automatically strip out the stack trace stuff. @ezyang what would assertRaisesRegex look like if it supported accept files/--accept?
body_text: Actually, I don't think that's going to work because we're going to have to manually specify the match string anyway, unless we can figure out how to automatically strip out the stack trace stuff. @ezyang what would assertRaisesRegex look like if it supported accept files/--accept?
body: Actually, I don't think that's going to work because we're going to have to manually specify the match string anyway, unless we can figure out how to automatically strip out the stack trace stuff. @ezyang what would `assertRaisesRegex` look like if it supported accept files/`--accept`?
